mapper.select: SELECT h.version, h.change_table AS changeTable, m.nickname, h.edit_time AS editTime FROM t_wiki_history AS h LEFT JOIN t_user_message AS m ON h.edit_by = m.user_id WHERE h.wiki_id = #{wikiId, jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY h.version DESC LIMIT #{startIndex, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pageSize, jdbcType=INTEGER}
